title: how to setup IDA pro linux GDB server
content: I have Ubuntu 14.04 x64 and I am running Ida pro V6.6 in virtual box in windows 8 ... currently I want to debug some Linux elf's using Ida either via IDA linux remote server or gdbserver but I don't know how to set up such thing (remember Linux is the host and windows is the guest and IDA runs in windows)
